arr = ds.query_index_member(index='000300.SH', start_date=20160101,
    end_date=20170505)
symbol_arr = ','.join(arr)
res = ds.query_adj_factor_daily(symbol_arr, start_date=20160101, end_date=
    20170101, div=False)
assert abs(res.loc[20160408, '300024.SZ'] - 10.735) < 0.001
assert abs(res.loc[20160412, '300024.SZ'] - 23.658) < 0.001
res = ds.query_adj_factor_daily(symbol_arr, start_date=20160101, end_date=
    20170101, div=True)
